Package index

All functions

baddeley.avg()
Compute aggregation of Ripley's K based on Baddeley et al. (1993)
combo.weight.avg()
Ensemble aggregation of spatial summaries (e.g. Ripley's K) using a combination of random weighting and weighting by the number of points
diggle.avg()
Compute aggregation of Ripley's K based on Diggle et al. (1991)
ensemble.avg()
Ensemble aggregation of spatial summaries (e.g. Ripley's K) using random weighting
landau.avg()
Compute aggregation of Ripley's K based on Landau et al. (2004)
resampling.avg()
Ensemble aggregation of spatial summaries (e.g. Ripley's K) via resampling
simdata
Simulated point pattern dataset for examples

Developed by Sarah Samorodnitsky.
